text: Kya tumhein is baat par tajjub hua ke tumhare paas khud tumhari apni qaum ke ek aadmi ke zariye se tumhare Rubb ki yaad dehani aayi taa-ke woh tumhein khabardaar karey? Bhool na jao ke tumhare Rubb ne Nooh ki qaum ke baad tumko uska jaanasheen(successors) banaya aur tumhein khoob tano-mand kiya(amply increased you in stature) , pas Allah ki qudrat ke karishmon ko yaad rakkho, umeed hai ke falaah paogeyâ€
